report.title: List of terms
report.query: with recursive nodes(id, path) as ( select id, term from cache_termlists_terms where parent_id is null and termlist_id=#termlist_id# and preferred=true and website_id in (#website_list#) union all select o.id, concat(path, '->', term) from cache_termlists_terms o join nodes n on n.id = o.parent_id where o.preferred=true ) select * from nodes order by path;
